com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics

Class EmbeddedBiometricsSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics.EmbeddedBiometricsSDK

  • public final class EmbeddedBiometricsSDK
extends Object
    Wrapper for the native library DermalogEmbeddedBiometrics.

    The class provides access to DERMALOG fingerprint scanner and DERMALOG coding and matching technology. This includes:

    • fingerprint capturing
    • NIST fingerprint quality check (NFIQ)
    • fingerprint template extraction
    • fingerprint verification (1:1)

    Supported fingerprint template formats (see DEBTemplateFormat):

    • DERMALOG
    • ISO/IEC 19794-2:2005
    • ANSI INCITS 378-2004

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmbeddedBiometricsSDK

        public EmbeddedBiometricsSDK(Context context)
                      throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Creates an EmbeddedBiometricsSDK instance and checks for required Android packages
        Prerequisite: The package com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics must be installed on the device. This is done by installing the application DERMALOG Embedded Biometrics (file: DermalogEmbeddedBiometrics.apk).

        Important:The instance should be created inside the onCreate() method of the parent activity, because it registers intents. Make sure to call {@link EmbeddedBiometricsSDK#uninitialize) in onDestroy().
        Parameters:
        activity - the calling parent activity
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Initialize the SDK. It is mandatory to call requestUSBPermissions(com.dermalog.android.usb.IUSBPermission) to request Android USB device permissions.
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Check if the SDK is initialized
        Returns:
        true if initialized, otherwise false

      • uninitialize

                  throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Free Android resources and uninitialize the native SDK.
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • queryDevices

        public DEBDeviceEntry[] queryDevices()
                              throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Search for attached devices. Important: USB permissions are required to query for devices. Make sure to call requestUSBPermissions(com.dermalog.android.usb.IUSBPermission) before using this metood.
        Returns:
        Array with attached devices
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • queryDevicesNative

        public DEBDeviceEntry[] queryDevicesNative()
                                    throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Search for attached devices with native USB implementation. Important: USB permissions are required to query for devices. Make sure to call requestUSBPermissions(com.dermalog.android.usb.IUSBPermission) before using this metood.
        Returns:
        Array with attached devices
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • queryDevicesAndroid

        public com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics.DEBDeviceEntryAndroid[] queryDevicesAndroid()
                                                                                    throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Search for attached devices with Android USB implementation. Important: USB permissions are required to query for devices. Make sure to call requestUSBPermissions(com.dermalog.android.usb.IUSBPermission) before using this metood.
        Returns:
        Array with attached devices
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException
